description: High Level Summary of Performance Data

targets.query: SELECT difference(last("tx_retries")) AS "TX Retry Count" FROM "wiperf-network" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT "bssid" AS "BSSID", "ssid" AS "SSID", "channel" AS "Channel", "channel_width" AS "Channel Width", "tx_rate_mbps" AS "Tx Phy Rate (Mbps)", "rx_rate_mbps" AS "Rx Phy Rate (Mbps)", "signal_level_dbm" AS "RSSI (dBm)" FROM "wiperf-network" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter

title: 05 - HTTP Report
